Class Rotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rotor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cryptography

    public class Rotor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cryptography

    Class that implements a rotor of the Enigma machine

     int ringPosition,
     int initialPosition,
     Alphabet inputAlphabet)

        Constructor. Creates a new object of type Rotor.

        Parameters:
        type - rotor's type
        ringPosition - the initial position of the ring
        initialPosition - the initial position of the rotor
        inputAlphabet - the alphabet of the Enigma machine

    • Method Detail

      • isNotch

        public boolean isNotch()

        Checks if the rotor's position is on notch.

        Returns:
        Returns true if the position is on notch, and false otherwise.

      • afterNotch

        public boolean afterNotch()

        Checks if the rotor's position is after the notch.

        Returns:
        Returns true is the position is after the notch, and false otherwise.
